## BucketWebsiteConfiguration class

Website configuration when a bucket is used to store Web pages for a site

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class BucketWebsiteConfiguration extends BaseResponse 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [BaseResponse](./api-common.baseresponse.md)

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [errorPage?](./api-buckets.bucketwebsiteconfiguration.errorpage.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Error page to be shown when requested page is not found |
|  [indexPage?](./api-buckets.bucketwebsiteconfiguration.indexpage.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Index page, e.g index.html |
|  [redirectHostName?](./api-buckets.bucketwebsiteconfiguration.redirecthostname.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Redirect URL if this bucket redirects requests to another bucket or Website |
